rules.Input: Detect **入力**： and require non-empty/non-placeholder content (publish view).
rules.Frozen: Detect markers: 凍結/凍結値/固定/固定値 or frozen_parameters/freeze (publish view).
rules.Statistic: Detect **指標**： and require non-empty/non-placeholder content (publish view).
rules.Reject: Detect markers: 棄却条件/棄却/reject/no-go/pass-fail (publish view).
rules.Output: Detect **出力**： (publish view). Fallback: accept an 'output/' reference (legacy).
rules.note: INTERNAL_ONLY blocks are excluded (publish mode behavior).
